snippet: The firm is expected to announce on Wednesday that it has hired Steven G. Eckhaus, a specialist in executive compensation packages, as a partner.
abstract: The firm is expected to announce on Wednesday that it has hired Steven G. Eckhaus, a specialist in executive compensation packages, as a partner.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Cadwalader to Hire a Top Adviser on Executive Pay
